patthana23.40:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.40:0.3_0: There is a self-distance shooter, with the wind.
patthana23.40:1.1_0: Not grasping to the principle of pleasant feeling ...
patthana23.40:2.1_0: Not taking up a cause of painful feeling ...
patthana23.40:3.1_0: Not taking pleasure and pain to arise.
